title: Trailer Hitch Installation: CURT 13063 GMC 2500
description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 13063 class 3 hitch on a 2012 GMC 2500 with a short bed. 

Install Sheet - https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/13063/installsheet/CM_13063_INS.PDF

Application Coverage:
2014-2011 Chevy Silverado 2500HD or 3500 (long or short bed) 
2014-2011 GMC Sierra 2500HD or 3500 (long or short bed) 


Special Notes:
***DO NOT EXCEED VEHICLE MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDED TOWING CAPACITY***
PERIODICALLY CHECK THIS RECEIVER HITCH TO ENSURE THAT ALL FASTENERS
ARE TIGHT AND THAT ALL STRUCTURAL COMPONENTS ARE SOUND.

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.
tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, trailer hitch, curt 13063, GMC Sierra 2500, how to install curt hitch, towing
